title: SAMSUNG 345 L Frost Free Double Door 3 Star Convertible Refrigerator  (Elegant Inox, RT37T4513S8/HL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Unit Refrigerator, User Manual with Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Product and 10 Years on Compressor From Samsung
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Convertible 5-in-1: This Samsung refrigerator features a Convertible 5-in-1 feature as part of its design. This allows you to switch the cooling modes of the fridge and freezer so you can benefit from extended freezer space or fridge space.
product_description.Twin Cooling Plus: Your fruits and vegetables will stay fresh for longer in this refrigerator as the Twin Cooling Plus feature maintains a humidity level of up to 70%.

review: Very Happy with this Refrigerator from Samsung. Got a great deal and on time delivery from flipkart. Value for money. Love it. Thank you again flipkart.

Excellent product with reasonable price. Installation done by the authorised persons from Samsung within one day. But, cool pad and fresh room compartment not available in the package. But these facilities are shown in the image.

Its good works better than my previous refrigerator
Just the door has 1 less compartment and no chill tray otherwise it's working good in hot 45° weather

This is the best refrigerator I’ve ever seen. Thanks Flipkart for the speedy and installation during this lockdown time also. We are truly happy from fridge and satisfied from the service of Flipkart.
The refrigerator is best in class for the price. It has sufficient space for family of 3 to 6. Also nice in Looks. Overall it was an amazing deal.

Loving this refrigerator already....using it since last 10 days..
345 ltr has good amount of space in it.....is wide and tall and can accommodate almost double when I compare it with my old Lg 190 ltr.
Does its job very well.....it has that deodorising filter which helps prevent food/fruits getting odour of other items.
Also loving the convertible feature that allows you to use freezer as Fridge......as I use freezer very occasionally.....
Will update review after few months..

Thanks Flipkart and Thanks Samsung for this wonderful product..

It was pretty worthwhile deal thanks flipkart as well as Samsung too , as I am infatuated on this unique alluring product, and I am delighted to recommend those who all keeping to thinking aspect the purchase of samsung fridge product in future. And sure about yours finding will turn up to be a master piece.

I think it's the best in the market.
Very premium looking.
Keeps your food fresh for long time.
I will recommend this product to everyone.
Ideal for the family of 4 to 5 members.
Delivery boy was also good.
Installation done within 48 hrs.
No heating issue.
Very useful convertible features.
I will say if your budget is 30k please go for it.
I got this product after exchanging my old refrigerator and applying few more discount at only rs 28441.
Packaging was very excellent.
No damage at all.

I am writing this review after use of 5 months.
It a best product I have got, Still running in good condition not a single issue. Good storage capacity, Nice and tuff material use in this product.
I suggest everyone to go with this.

Flipkart is doing good and competing to Amazone.
This is nice product and I purchased during bank offer period so I got in much less price than market. A small defect was there but it is acceptable in this price. Flipkart customer support is very prompt and co operative. I will suggest to purchase products from Flipkart.

I must say that it came with very good packaging and the Samsung installation engineer visited the very next day for demo and installation of the fridge. The fridge has one super tiny dent on one of the sides which is not at all visible. There are No scratches on the front. The cooling and freshness is awesome. I really like this Samsung product. And I highly recommend this as the converter options are on the door and in the front itself with touch controls, unlike LG convertible refrigerators. How this review helps who’s looking for a good double-door convertible refrigerator.

Writing this review after a month of purchasing this, since this is convertible it gives us more space when freezer isn't required. Also the way it has got delivered to our place and next day the technician visit us for installation and demo , my family and I are all the more happy with this purchase and since it's coming from a brand like Samsung I know it's gonna last me long and service is gonna be good. It looks pretty good and has a lot of storage space for a family of 5 and a makeup hoarder who stores all her lipstick in the fridge 😛

It's too early to judge on fridge but overall quality seems to be good.
But installation provided by flipkart is not worthy hence reduced the rating.
Person who came for installation was from flipkart and less knowledgeable. He was carrying a stablizer which would work for tv and he was recommending me to buy.

Installation should be provided by Samsung, I still need demo from Samsung if flipkart can arrange it would be great

The refrigerator was delivered in only 4 days and in the best condition possible. It's shiny and free of any sort of dents. Reading comments makes one feel little doubtful and so was I but surprisingly I received the best fridge at the best price and quality.

The fridge is installed yesterday and I will update about its functioning after 1 month.

One more guide is while buying any big equipments online, also check seller ratings.
I am writing this review after 3 months and I must admit this that it has given a stellar performance. Great built, capacity and performance. Highly recommended !!! Thank you Flipkart 😊

I just love this. I was hesitant but now happy that I made the right choice. I am happy that I chose the 345 L model. It is so spacious and deep. However thanks to the steel front it looks like it takes up less space in my room than my smaller old fridge. I have used the fridge for a day. My comments below. I will update after a few weeks of use.

The delivery was a little delayed but it was exceptionally bad weather...so understandable. Delivery went smooth. Installation was the very next day. Went well.

1. Looks good
2. Deep shelves
3. There is no door shelf opposite the veg basket so it is really huge which I love
4. No chiller tray and a shelf instead which is what I prefer
5. Solid strong shelves. Good solid feeling plastics
6. Side is a kind of matte-finished metal like metal cupboards. Not unattractive. It would be weird to have a fully steel sci-fi like item in the room
7. Controls are easy to figure out
8. Ice making is quick
9. Nice to have door shelves in the freezer also
10. The ice maker that twists and empties into the ice bin is cute. Kids love it
11. The sound of the fridge running was new and strange. I think I will get used to it. It's not louder than my old fridge, just different
12. Since I do not use the freezer for most of the year, I love the ability to turn it off

I'd say go for it!

Delivered very late but product is very awesome best for 5-6 and also best for price,from all the Refrigerators this is very good and you will definitely notice it I am writing this comment after few months of experience so its a extremely very awesome
You should buy this product and no need to install any stabilizer , it's have very good stabilizer inbuilt and convertible features is also good........

Good product, excellent packing. Delivery from earlier estimates. No dent/scratches found. The 43-inch UHD TV and refrigerator worked well over the past week. The overall experience is one step ahead of the showroom. The performance of the service engineer is also remarkable. LED TV and refrigerator are plugged together.
Its superb. You can buy. No issues. Very much happy.

Product is awesome but be careful with delivery person especially for apartment delivery. I have very bad experience with courier guys in Jamnagar. Not good for Flipkart too...because of them I got my product on 3rd attempt.

Fully meets the expectations. Excellent design. The twin cooling feature is awesome and ensures that the freezer and refrigerator compartment cooling is independent. Convertible feature enables more flexible usage and energy saving. It's two months now of this purchase and am very much satisfied with its performance. It's very spacious but the space would have been much better utilized if option for one more shelf was there. Samsung refrigerators are anyway excellent. My previous refrigerator too was of Samsung, bought 20 years back and is still working quite satisfactorily. Flipkart delivery was prompt and was delivered in just two days and installed the next day. However, I am very much disappointed with the exchange service of Flipkart as it rejected the old refrigerator just because of a small scratch of the size of a pencil tip on the bottom of the refrigerator body. I don't know what they want in the old item. Should it be as good as a new one. And this is not the first time. Three years back too they had rejected my old washing machine on similar ground, though it was working perfectly and at that time they didn't had the policy of spot payment of the exchange value to retain the new purchased item and so they took back the washing machine despite my offer to pay the exchange amount. Fortunately, they have now changed the policy and this time I could retain the new refrigerator by paying the exchange amount of 3000. And just to point out the deliberate rejection of old items by their delivery person, I want to state that I was able to sell my old refrigerator at Rs 1000 more than what Flipkart was offering in exchange.

A very good looking metallic finish. The display attracts attention. Has two more modes to turn off the fridge or freezer portion compared to 3 in 1 convertible model. Not so commonly used so you can look at 3 in 1 models to save money. Rather large in size at nearly 6 feet without stand. Too much storage for a 4-member family unless you plan to store pulses and foodgrains (which some people do, by the way). Convertible mode works flawlessly. Not much heating or sound. Door ajar sound is very useful as well.

Product(345ltr, RT37T4513S8/HL/2020) description shows there is coolpack and in specification Coolpad is available but in real or actual no coolpad is there. I searched details from Samsung official website and got to know that there was no Coolpad. No freshroom but freshroom image in description. Samsung describes that freezer converted into freeze but in practical it maintains minimum cooling by freezer but still less than zero. If we switch off freezer,it doesn't switch off but cool air is coming out from vents, but no ice formation. Misleading information to some extent by Samsung. But performance is good.

One star because, when the box is opened by technician there two areas covered with small tape, we just pulled off those and did not notice anything at that time but then after couple of hours we realized that these are put in place to cover scratches and a small dent.
